description:
Single father Kakushi Gotou has a secret. He’s a top-selling artist of popular erotic manga, but his impressionable young daughter, Hime, can never find out! Now he’s having to bend over backwards just to keep her inquisitive little mind from discovering what he does for a living. A father-daughter tale of love and laughter.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ความลับของคุณพ่อเลี้ยงเดี่ยว

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Drawing
tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

title.native: 劇場編集版 かくしごと ―ひめごとはなんですか―

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/3doO4OZ07IlQnOo)

A Japanese gag manga artist. His most famous works are Go!! Southern Ice Hockey Club, Katte ni Kaizou and Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei. His other major works include √P Root Paradise, Sodatte Darling!! and The Sun's Soldier Poka Poka.  

Former Assistants: [Kenjiro Hata](https://anilist.co/staff/100074), [Maeda-kun](https://anilist.co/staff/172154/Maedakun) (also known as MAEDAX, MAEDAX G, MAEDAX Roman)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

Flumpool is a Japanese rock band of four from Osaka. The name is a compound word of f from the English word four, since there are 4 members, along with the word meaning mass, lump, and the word pool. Flumpool falls under the label of A-Sketch.

Yamamura has been writing the lyrics for almost all of their songs and Sakai has been doing the composing.

Members:
• Ryuta Yamamura (山村 隆太) - vocals, guitar
• Kazuki Sakai (阪井 一生) - guitar
• Genki Amakawa (尼川 元気) - bass
• Seiji Ogura (小倉 誠司) - drums

(Source: MAL)

**Date of Birth:** ?? ??, 1977
**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryohirata0110)** | **[Blog (JP)](http://hirataryo.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/)**

**Ryou Hirata** is a Japanese animator and designer, who does prop, character and art design.
